# sakura_cloudhsm_peer (Data Source)

Get information about an existing CloudHSM Peer.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_cloudhsm" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
  # or
  # id = "cloudhsm-resource-id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cloudhsm_id` (String) The ID of the CloudHSM to associate with the client

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the CloudHSM Peer.

### Read-Only

- `index` (Number) The index of the CloudHSM Peer
- `routes` (List of String) The routes for the CloudHSM Peer
- `status` (String) The status of the CloudHSM Peer
